summary: Another spoof from the Franco and Ciccio team in which the boys, who are running a scam pretending to be bounty hunters, are 'persuaded' to help a real bounty hunter discover a treasure by claiming to be the heirs of a deceased lawman.
cast: Franco Franchi|Ciccio Ingrassia|George Hilton|Gloria Paul|Orchidea De Santis|Ignazio Spalla|Mimmo Palmara|Umberto D'Orsi|Ivano Staccioli|Giovanni Ivan Scratuglia|Galliano Sbarra|Enzo Andronico|Armando Carini|Fulvia Franco|Guido Lollobrigida|Fortunato Arena|Calogero Azzaretto|Silvana Bacci|Remo Capitani|Alberigo Donadeo|Fulvio Mingozzi|Franco Moscon|Dino Strano|Nino Terzo|Franco Ukmar
title: I due figli di Ringo
